verbose_text: Oral application of amitriptyline required 12 days to induce changes in the concentrations of sphingomyelin and ceramide in Golgi bodies and the ER but had no effect after 5 days, a finding consistent with the changes in lysosomes of cells treated with amitriptyline.
evidence: amitriptyline required 12 days to induce changes in the concentrations of sphingomyelin
